statements: SELECT * FROM food_preferences;
SELECT food_name, like_level FROM food_preferences WHERE person_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM food_preferences WHERE like_level > 3;
SELECT food_name, dislike_reason FROM food_preferences WHERE person_id = '98765432-eebb-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT person_id, food_name, like_level, dislike_reason FROM food_preferences WHERE food_name = 'Pizza';
SELECT * FROM food_preferences WHERE like_level > 3 ORDER BY person_id DESC;
SELECT food_name, like_level FROM food_preferences WHERE person_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT person_id, food_name, dislike_reason FROM food_preferences WHERE like_level < 2 AND food_name LIKE '%pizza%' ORDER BY person_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_likes FROM food_preferences WHERE like_level >= 4;
SELECT person_id, food_name, like_level, dislike_reason FROM food_preferences WHERE like_level BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY like_level DESC, person_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM food_preferences;
SELECT user_id, favorite_fruits FROM food_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM food_preferences ORDER BY favorite_veggies ASC;
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE recipe_name LIKE '%Pasta%';
SELECT * FROM food_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, favorite_fruits FROM food_preferences WHERE favorite_veggies LIKE '%tomato%';
SELECT favorite_fruits, favorite_veggies FROM food_preferences WHERE dietary_restrictions IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, favorite_veggies FROM food_preferences ORDER BY favorite_veggies DESC;
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE recipe_name LIKE '%chicken%' AND ingredients LIKE '%lemon%' ORDER BY recipe_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT username, created_at FROM Users WHERE preference_id IS NULL;
SELECT user_id, username, cuisine_type FROM Users INNER JOIN Preferences ON Users.preference_id = Preferences.preference_id;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients[1] AS main_ingredient, cuisine_type FROM Recipes WHERE cuisine_type = 'Italian';
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients[2] AS second_ingredient, instructions FROM Recipes WHERE recipe_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT recipe_name, cuisine_type FROM Recipes ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, cuisine_type FROM Users INNER JOIN Preferences ON Users.preference_id = Preferences.preference_id;
SELECT * FROM Recipes WHERE cuisine_type = 'Italian' AND array_length(ingredients, 1) >= 5;

SELECT Users.username, Preferences.cuisine_type, Recipes.recipe_name FROM Users JOIN Preferences ON Users.preference_id = Preferences.preference_id JOIN Recipes ON Preferences.cuisine_type = Recipes.cuisine_type ORDER BY Users.username ASC;
SELECT * FROM Food_Preferences;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients, difficulty_level FROM Recipes WHERE difficulty_level = 'Easy';
SELECT user_id, favorite_fruits, favorite_vegetables FROM Food_Preferences ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT model_name, accuracy FROM AI_Models WHERE accuracy > 0.85;
SELECT plan_id, week_number, day_of_week FROM Meal_Plans WHERE user_id = 123;

SELECT * FROM Recipes WHERE difficulty_level = 'Intermediate' AND ingredients LIKE '%chicken%' ORDER BY recipe_id ASC;
SELECT model_name, model_type, accuracy FROM AI_Models WHERE accuracy > 0.8 ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT user_id, favorite_vegetables FROM Food_Preferences WHERE favorite_vegetables IS NOT NULL ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM Recipes WHERE ingredients LIKE '%tomato%' OR ingredients LIKE '%pasta%' ORDER BY recipe_id DESC;

SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM Users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT full_name, age, gender FROM Users ORDER BY age DESC;
